F.
“Licensed Products” shall mean BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports
Water, Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotics™ Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro
Football Legends Logo on the Licensed Products’ affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. Other products of the
Company may be added to the list of Licensed Products during the Contract Period by written amendment to this
Agreement. All amendments to this Agreement must be signed by all parties to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
F.
“Licensed Products” shall mean products using the Pro Football Legends Logo on the affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. Other products of the Company may be added to the list of Licensed Products during the Contract Period by written amendment to this
Agreement. All amendments to this Agreement must be signed by all parties to this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the explicit list of products constituting 'Licensed Products', the contract becomes vague. Section Four still references specific products (BlackMP Living Water, etc.) and their 'Unit' values for donation calculations, but the definition of 'Licensed Products' no longer includes them specifically. This creates an internal contradiction about which products are subject to the donation agreement.

The Company will provide to the NFLA-NC upon request the most recent quarterly sales report of the Company’s
Licensed Products.
perturbation.changed_text: The Company will provide to the NFLA-NC a sales report upon request.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the term 'Licensed Products' from this sentence, there is no indication of which sales will be reported. This omission undermines the NFLA-NC's ability to verify donations from the sales of the defined products. Furthermore, because 'Licensed Products' is referenced throughout the document in relation to donations, this lack of specificity makes it difficult to enforce any of the contractual obligations.
